name: 賀一平
objective: 本課程介紹語言教學與學習原則，語言習得理論，和語言習得領域重要研究發現。期能建立學生應用語言學知識與日後相關研究的基礎。課程涵蓋主要內容包括：母語習得理論與實踐、第二語言(外語)習得理論與實踐、母語習得與第二語言(外語)習得之相同與相異處、影響語言習得重要因素(情性因素與社會文化因素)、語言學習者策略、對比分析、錯誤分析、語言溝通能力、閱讀理論與實踐、 寫作理論與實踐。
schedule:
Week　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　Topic
1　　Orientation
2　　Schools of thought in second language acquisition;     foundations of second language acquisition
3　　Theories of First language acquisition
4　　Issues in first and second language acquisition
5　　Age and Acquisition
6　　Learning theories and Language Learning
7　　Styles and strategies
8　　Styles of strategies
9　　Personality/affective factors in second language acquisition
10　　Personality/affective factors in second language acquisition
11　　Socio-cultural factors in second language acquisition
12　　Socio-cultural factors in second language acquisition; communicative competence
13　　Communicative competence
14　　Cross-linguistic influence and learner language
15　　Cross-linguistic influence and learner language; classroom second language acquisition and form-focused instruction
16　　Second language learning/acquisition theories
17　　Second language learning/acquisition theories
18　　Final Examination
scorePolicy:
Mid-term Examination: 30%
Final Examination: 40%
Oral Presentation and Journal Writing: 30%
